column4: is there anyway to downgrade from 9.10 to 9.04 and keep your files?
if you put /home on a separate partition then yes
just put your /home on a separate partition
heres a guide to put /home on a separate partition after install,, worth knowing, better to at install ;-)  http://www.wood-bee-co.com/woodbeeco/index.php?option=com_content&task=view&id=35&Itemid=9
